description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              "To help people & companies achieve their dreams" is our mission. We are on our way to accomplish it successfully via some brands namely VietnamWorks.com, topITworks, HRInsider, JapanWorks.
              
              Currently, we are finding a dedicated & passionate person who is inspired by challenges to become our Digital
              
              Marketing Executive, join our innovative team to support our clients and make them happier. Your responsibilities are as below:
              

              1. Digital Marketing Service - Project Management (80%)
              

              - Assisting in the creation and planning of digital marketing campaigns.
              
              - Reporting and analyzing digital marketing campaigns.
              
              - Analyzing the effectiveness of digital marketing campaigns and optimizing accordingly.
              
              - Coordinating internally with product, sales and design teams.
              
              - Coordinating externally with media agencies
              

              2. Other Marketing Activities in needs (20%): Supporting other big projects
              

              ***Benefits:
              
              • Competitive salary and twice-a-year performance review that can lead to salary raise or promotion.
              
              •	An amazing company and team culture where your freedom and comfort in working and delivering results are protected and valued above all other factors.
              
              •	Regular team activities such as weekly team lunch, team-building trip, company trip, company party and many more exciting things to look forward to.
              
              •	Premium health-care plan
              
              •	15 days off per year, 6 days sick-leave, 5 days urgent cases and other types.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              We would like to hear from those who have:
              

              - 2 years of digital marketing experience
              
              - Experience in planning, developing and executing on marketing campaigns.
              
              - Experience in managing and setting up digital ad on display ( FB, GG, Linkedln or other popular platform)
              
              - Experience in using digital tracking tools.
              
              - Ability to work in self-directed, fat-paced, result-oriented environment and to meet deadline.
              
              - Strong analytical skills with the ability to analyze data and make recommendations.
              
              - Good command of spoken and written English.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
